adrFormatAddress: 262 Central Park W #1, New York, NY 10024-3512, USA

originalText.text: Went to test for sleep apnea. Had three separate co-pays of $60 each. Called beforehand to check my insurance covered it, then they billed me for a total of OVER $5000! Complete rip-off. I called them to dispute the charge, and they said they "wrote it off" my insurance, but it still appears as a claim, and if I had paid it they of course would have accepted it. No reason for that test to cost that much and why are they charging patients directly if they then are willing to write it off when someone complains? Fishy... You can see from other reviews on Google and other sites that I'm not the first person this has happened to.

originalText.text: Dr Volpi refused to renew my prescription for a CPAP after my machine broke unless I came into the city for a new sleep study at his facility during the second wave of the COVID-19 pandemic, this despite the fact that insurance was willing to replace the machine. Because of the holidays, I will have been without a CPAP for multiple weeks, putting my health at risk, and when I get a new prescription from my new ENT closer to home, I will no longer be under my 2020 deductible for insurance so it will end up costing me much more money to get the same machine.  Thanks a LOT Dr. Volpi. I hope the extra money to your facility from your remaining patients is worth it.

originalText.text: Dr Volpi changed my life, he is one of the top in New York at his speciality.  I did a recommended nasal surgery and I feel like a different person, my heart is functioning way better. After the surgery my nose looked normal no blue marks or any of that. Within a week I can breath again much better than before the surgery.  He charges reasonable amount compare to the level of treatment you're  getting. A 100% recommendation.

originalText.text:
They wouldn’t give me a CPAP prescription because they had to “update my file.”
I asked my doctor in Florida and he said it should be for life. Apnea doesn’t  disappear because your machine breaks!
Just another way to rip off a patient for a doctors visit.

originalText.text:
Dr. Volpi and his staff took great care of me and was very thorough before, during and after my deviated septum surgery. I'm forever grateful for his handiwork, as I can breath normally now and don't suffer from the many problems that come with an obstructed breathing passage.
If you're looking for a quality person and a top notch surgeon, please visit Dr. Volpi for a consultation.
